object.name: sendGift
object.description: Sends a gift to the given user or channel chat. The gift can't be converted to Telegram Stars by the receiver. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Sends a gift to the given user or channel chat. The gift can't be converted to Telegram Stars by the receiver. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Sends a gift to the given user or channel chat. The gift can't be converted to Telegram Stars by the receiver. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Required if chat_id is not specified. Unique identifier of the target user who will receive the gift.
annotations.html_description: Required if chat_id is not specified. Unique identifier of the target user who will receive the gift.
annotations.rst_description: Required if *chat_id* is not specified. Unique identifier of the target user who will receive the gift.
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: Required if user_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the chat or username of the channel (in the format @channelusername) that will receive the gift.
annotations.html_description: Required if user_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the chat or username of the channel (in the format @channelusername) that will receive the gift.
annotations.rst_description: Required if *user_id* is not specified. Unique identifier for the chat or username of the channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`) that will receive the gift.
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Pass True to pay for the gift upgrade from the bot's balance, thereby making the upgrade free for the receiver
annotations.html_description: Pass True to pay for the gift upgrade from the bot's balance, thereby making the upgrade free for the receiver
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to pay for the gift upgrade from the bot's balance, thereby making the upgrade free for the receiver
annotations.name: pay_for_upgrade

annotations.description: Text that will be shown along with the gift; 0-255 characters
annotations.html_description: Text that will be shown along with the gift; 0-255 characters
annotations.rst_description: Text that will be shown along with the gift; 0-255 characters
annotations.name: text

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the text. See formatting options for more details. Entities other than 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strikethrough', 'spoiler', and 'custom_emoji' are ignored.
annotations.html_description: Mode for parsing entities in the text. See formatting options for more details. Entities other than “bold”, “italic”, “underline”, “strikethrough”, “spoiler”, and “custom_emoji” are ignored.
annotations.rst_description: Mode for parsing entities in the text. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details. Entities other than 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strikethrough', 'spoiler', and 'custom_emoji' are ignored.
annotations.name: text_parse_mode

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the gift text. It can be specified instead of text_parse_mode. Entities other than 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strikethrough', 'spoiler', and 'custom_emoji' are ignored.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the gift text. It can be specified instead of text_parse_mode. Entities other than “bold”, “italic”, “underline”, “strikethrough”, “spoiler”, and “custom_emoji” are ignored.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in the gift text. It can be specified instead of *text_parse_mode*. Entities other than 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strikethrough', 'spoiler', and 'custom_emoji' are ignored.
annotations.name: text_entities
